typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		{TransmittingFlightAttd} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RIMSourceFile
RIMSourceFile derive(GenerateCol = locate(NoSalesReason,"Other")) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		{Flight#},
		Origin,
		Dest,
		FlightDate,
		NoSalesReason,
		{TransmittingFlightAttd},
		GenerateCol
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RIMTarget
